definitions: the tense used to describe actions, events, or states that happened or existed before the present time
relating to the tense used to describe actions, events, or states that happened or existed before the present time
examples: The preterit is several times more frequent than the perfect.
In terms of grammar, they favor dove as the preterit of dive.
Highlight the imperfect and preterit verbs in the text.
